backend/main.mo: Motoko backend implementing access control, user profiles, blob storage mixin, rate card CRUD, and quote-related types and operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing roles of various frontend files across the application.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading SheetJS and jsPDF libraries and bootstrapping the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React wrapper configuring theme, React Query provider, layout shell, and rendering MainApp.
frontend/src/components/AccountManagerMa: UI for uploading, adding, listing, and deleting account managers with CSV import and template download.
frontend/src/components/AnalysisTab.tsx: Quote analysis interface enabling cost editing, margin calculations, and Excel/PDF export.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button component for handling Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/components/MainApp.tsx: Top-level component managing tab navigation and current quote state, rendering generators, analysis, history, reports, rate card, and settings tabs.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: File is empty with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/QuoteGenerator.t: Handles item selection, filtering, quote generation, and analysis requests using rate card data and form inputs.
Displays past quotes in a table, allowing users to reload a selected quote into the app.
frontend/src/components/QuoteSummary.tsx: Shows a formatted summary of a generated quote with options to print or export to Excel or PDF.
Allows uploading, parsing, previewing, and updating the rate card via CSV or Excel files.
Shows a preview of parsed rate card items and prompts the user to confirm replacing existing data.
frontend/src/components/RateCardTable.ts: Renders a scrollable table displaying rate card items with key fields and formatted costs.
frontend/src/components/ReportsTab.tsx: Displays quote history, allows selecting a quote, and exports selected quote details to Excel.
frontend/src/components/SettingsTab.tsx: Renders settings UI containing account manager management.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading stored identities and handling login, logout, and status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls in React Query hooks for rate cards, quotes, analysis, and account manager operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles, color variables, dark mode themes, and print styles.
frontend/src/lib/accountManagerParser.ts: Parses CSV or Excel files to extract account manager name and email, with validation and error handling.
frontend/src/lib/excelParser.ts: Parses .xlsx files in the browser using SheetJS, maps header columns, validates required fields, and returns structured item data.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Provides number, currency, and percentage formatting helpers used throughout the UI.
frontend/src/lib/pdfExporter.ts: Generates styled quote or analysis PDFs using jsPDF and autotable, formatting headers, tables, and totals before saving to file.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React application with React Query and Internet Identity providers and mounts the App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, feature requirements, and state for implementing styled PDF quote exports.
